page.title: 11Sandwich;Employment/Housing
page.content: Adjacent to the town are coal mines and factories manufacturing a wide variety of things from medicine to hot water bottles and diesel compressors.Retail traders and labour intensive farms producing market garden crops also help to provide a wide variety of employment.While these activities provide many opportunities some of the population,particularly young people are finding it difficult to obtain permanent positions. +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ A wide range of living accommodation is available;from large exclusive propertie with retained staff at Sandwich Bay to small terraced houses in the town centre.Many of the old working peoples'cottages are now weekend cottages and the population that used to live in the old town has moved to new houses outside the wall.
